name: Telegram Approval Buttons
description: Adds inline keyboard buttons to exec approval messages in Telegram. Tap to approve/deny without typing commands.

chatId.description: Telegram chat ID where approval buttons are sent. Falls back to channels.telegram.allowFrom[0].

botToken.description: Telegram bot token. Falls back to channels.telegram.token or TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN env.

staleMins.description: Minutes before a pending approval is considered stale and cleaned up.

chatId.label: Telegram Chat ID
chatId.help: Auto-detected from channels.telegram.allowFrom if not set.

botToken.label: Bot Token
botToken.help: Only needed if different from the main Telegram channel token.
